PATCH /accounts/{account_id}/rulesets/{r.description: Updates an existing rule in an account ruleset.

schema.description: The unique ID of the rule.
schema.title: ID

schema.description: The unique ID of the ruleset.
schema.title: ID

schema.description: The unique ID of the account.
schema.title: ID

action.description: The action to perform when the rule matches.
action.title: Action

action_parameters.description: The parameters configuring the rule action.
action_parameters.title: Action parameters

description.description: An informative description of the rule.
description.example: Execute the OWASP ruleset when the IP address is not 1.1.1.1
description.title: Description

enabled.description: Whether the rule should be executed.
enabled.title: Enabled

expression.description: The expression defining which traffic will match the rule.
expression.title: Expression

logging.description: An object configuring the rule's logging behavior.

enabled.description: Whether to generate a log when the rule matches.
enabled.title: Enabled

logging.title: Logging

ref.description: The reference of the rule (the rule ID by default).
ref.title: Ref

allOf.description: An object configuring where the rule will be placed.
allOf.title: Position

before.description: The ID of another rule to place the rule before. An empty value causes the rule to be placed at the top.
before.title: Before

allOf.description: An object configuring where the rule will be placed.
allOf.title: Position

after.description: The ID of another rule to place the rule after. An empty value causes the rule to be placed at the bottom.
after.title: After

allOf.description: An object configuring where the rule will be placed.
allOf.title: Position

index.description: An index at which to place the rule, where index 1 is the first rule.
index.title: Index

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.
success.title: Success

description.description: An informative description of the ruleset.
description.example: My ruleset to execute managed rulesets
description.title: Description

name.description: The human-readable name of the ruleset.
name.title: Name

id.description: The unique ID of the ruleset.
id.title: ID

last_updated.description: The timestamp of when the ruleset was last modified.
last_updated.title: Last updated

rules.description: The list of rules in the ruleset.
rules.title: Rules

200.description: Update an account ruleset rule response.

schema.description: A failure response object.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.
success.title: Success

schema.title: Failure response

4XX.description: Update an account ruleset rule failure response.
